seshoumara: is working on releasing Low Level Hero: a programming-puzzle game with only two commands, copy-paste and search-replace. Try the game at https://seshoumara.itch.io/low-level-hero !
dev_spajus: has released Stardeus: a sci-fi colony management simulator with aspects of automation, base building and space exploration. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1380910/Stardeus/ !
jotson: is working on releasing The Mailroom: a horror job simulator where you work in the mailroom of a small regional office of Hell located in Modesto, California. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3965430/The_Mailroom/ !
MrEliptik: is working on releasing Hyperslice: a fast paced action arena roguelike where you defeat waves of enemies using your dash. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2977820/Hyperslice/ !
Aarimous: is working on releasing A Game About A Black Hole: an incremental game about sucking up asteroids, collecting resources, and upgrading your Singularity. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3694480/A_Game_About_A_Black_Hole/ !
Lentsius: is working on releasing Fogpiercer: a deckbuilder roguelite in which you build and upgrade your train to build your deck, fight off bandits on a square grid using unique carriage cards. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3219010/Fogpiercer/ !
GrumbleOfPugz: is working on releasing Megabat: a pixel art 2D "platformer" passion project, with an emphasis on using different abilities to enhance your movement. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2429230/Megabat/ !
B4zzzing: is working on releasing Old Bones: step into the shoes of a young carpenter on an island inhabited by a crew of retired pirates. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3358260/Old_Bones/ !
RedCabinGames: is working on releasing Space Scavenger 2: an Action-Roguelike where you scavenge for modules to build a hodgepodge spaceship. Go wishlist the game at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1962010/Space_Scavenger_2/ !
moonfassa: is a competitive Faeria streamer and content creator. Check out also his Youtube channel at https://www.youtube.com/c/Moonfassa !
joxonman: is an amazing Fantasy Artist, you can see his portfolio at https://darkojovanov.artstation.com/ !
JustCovino: is working on Project Goo. Try all of his games/prototypes at https://freedomforgestudios.itch.io/ !
